"Phantom God of Creation": "Haaaaaaaaa!"
"Haah... Haah... Haah..."
"I... don't understand."

"Why... do you resist creation?
What awaits ahead is... only destruction.
You humans should know this."
"It's not that we're refusing it. I'm saying that, even if we don't rely on you, people can walk with their own two feet."
"Hey, God... We humans aren't perfect like you, and we make mistakes. I'm sure it's irritating to watch."
"But still... We've made it this far. We make mistake, after mistake, after mistake... and yet we keep moving towards the future."
"So... Keep watching over us, God. See the future we make for ourselves. Our future..."

"To surpass even God... to create a future...
Fu, haha... Hahahaha... You've certainly earned this future."

"However... God is immortal. If people desire it,
I will be embodied once more."
"If that happens, we'll show you the power of our will, again. That we don't have to rely on God."
"Is that... the will of mankind?"
"No... This is... my... Hitsugi Yasaka's will."

"Hmph... Very well. Until the next time I appear...
I will leave the fate of this planet...
in humanity's hands."
"Enga."
"Ardem. I'm sure there was a world that only you have seen."
"But you know, Earth won't be destroyed that easily. It's true that we may be foolish, but we still have things to do."
"For now, just leave it all to us. We'll make it all work, somehow."
"The remains of the Ether I left behind will reform into God, and come again."
"I don't know how many times you'll have to fight it... I simply don't know."
"No, that won't be all. Taking in the tens of thousands of years of my despair, it will likely embody itself into something much stronger, much darker."
"Rather than creation, a powerful and merciless God of Destruction..."
"Don't worry. We've already factored that in. Believe in the ones who brought you down."
"...I'll do that. I'm sorry for all the trouble, Enga..."
"It's okay. Rest now, Ardem."
"Aru!"
"I'm okay. But, Mother is..."
"Mother... for us, you...?"

"No... This body was almost nothing from
the start. What's here before you, is the embodiment of a miracle. There's no need to worry."
"This is how it should be. The guiding hands of God and Mother are no longer needed... The children can walk on their own two feet."
"This is truly a new future for the Earth. It's a future you must forge for yourselves."

"<%me>... Have I come close to being like
the original? Have I become like Xion?"
"1. Mother is Mother"
"2. You're exactly like Xion"
"Is that so? In that case... my vengeance.. will end here."
"We're okay now. We'll make mistakes, but we'll be okay. This planet... all of us... we'll be okay."
"So rest in peace... Mother."
"Hitsugi..."
"It's okay, I'm not going to hesitate anymore."
"Everyone... let's go home. To where we belong."
